Sat, 22 Jun 2024 17:00:00 +0000 Darwin-based Kiwi Damian Crook, left, and his Australian-born son Declan Laverty. Declan was murdered aged 20 while working at a bottle store in Darwin in March 2023. Jurors found his killer guilty in the Northern Territory Supreme Court in Darwin on Thursday.
